column1: '''''Pesma o Otruu i Itrun''''' is a bilingual (Serbian/English) edition of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s poem "[[The Lay of Aotrou and Itroun]]". The book was printed in 500 copies, and it is the first reprint of the poem since its publication in ''[[The Welsh Review (Vol.IV, No.4)
column11: articlename=Index Translationum (search result for Tolkien + Serbian)
column17: articlename=Dz. R. R. TOLKIN- PESMA O OTRUU I ITRUN
